scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:sol
scripts.flatten: npx truffle-flattener $(find contracts -type f -print0 | tr \\0 \  ) > build/flat.sol
scripts.web3j: find build/contracts -name "*.json" -exec web3j truffle generate --javaTypes {} -p com.lestari.android.blockchain.contract -o build/java/ \;
scripts.securify: docker pull chainsecurity/securify && docker run -v $(pwd) chainsecurity/securify
scripts.slither: docker pull trailofbits/slither && npx truffle compile && npm run flatten && docker run -v $(pwd):/tmp/truffle:ro trailofbits/slither slither /tmp/truffle/build/flat.sol
